name: Army Simulator
description:
Welcome To Army Simulator!

How  To Play:

1.Drag your units to the zombie's for them to fight when the zombie's die you gain money.

2.Your units will lose health drag them to the healing place which looks like this  Then wait 10 seconds for them to heal.

3.With your cash you can buy new units on the side of the screen.

4.To start a new round click the start round button.

5.When all your units die you lose and restart.

Hope You Have Fun!
